dcterms:creator: J. Angwin
J. Larson
S. Mattu
L. Kirchner
dcterms:description: The COMPAS dataset is used to evaluate the manipulation of feature attributions and counterfactual explanations in biased models, particularly focusing on how adversaries can design biased models that manipulate model agnostic feature attribution methods.
dcterms:title: COMPAS

dcterms:description: The Communities & Crime dataset is used to train adversarial models and evaluate the effectiveness of manipulated counterfactual explanations, focusing on fairness and recourse costs across protected and non-protected groups.
dcterms:title: Communities & Crime
